title: 快速升级
author: liusjj
txt_content:
我终于会快速升级了
只需在浏览器搜索mcbbs如何快速升级就可以了

replies.author: 零素
replies.txt_content: 啊这...你这个方法可行吗

replies.author: 安逸An_Yi
replies.txt_content: 啊这，原来是这样啊
啊 想骗我去浏览器搜索

replies.author: liusjj
replies.txt_content: 点击第一个，按他方法做就可以了

replies.author: k35462
replies.txt_content: 结果还是搜到了bbs的帖子

replies.author: liusjj
replies.txt_content:
k35462 发表于 2020-7-28 11:13
结果还是搜到了bbs的帖子
就是BBS的贴

replies.author: 我白给
replies.txt_content: 就是氵贴嘛

replies.author: 辰逸久伴
replies.txt_content: 啊这，太强了

replies.author: 柒宇__
replies.txt_content: 啊这 这么会快速升级？

replies.author: WYL0zhu
replies.txt_content: 搜到的都是假的，水帖才对。

replies.author: liusjj
replies.txt_content: 我今天才1级，现在就3级了

replies.author: TheSuncommand
replies.txt_content:
啊,然后你就会看到一堆离谱的答案
推荐site:mcbbs.net
这样就不会给你推nt的回答了

replies.author: liusjj
replies.txt_content:
TheSuncommand 发表于 2020-7-28 11:53
啊,然后你就会看到一堆离谱的答案
推荐site:mcbbs.net
这样就不会给你推nt的回答了 ...
谢谢aaaaaaaaaaaaa

replies.author: IceFireKing
replies.txt_content: 氵帖才是王道

replies.author: liusjj
replies.txt_content:

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1018866-1-1.html

replies.txt_content: emmm我咋这么不相信呢你不可能骗我去搜的

replies.txt_content: 楼主无了

replies.txt_content: 原来是这样的啊

replies.author: 是柏柏啊~
replies.txt_content: 啊这，我也想升级

replies.author: 九段下前辈
replies.txt_content: 氵贴使人快乐

replies.author: re闪电侠
replies.txt_content: 啊这，看到了lv:？这就是升级的最高境界吗？快到让人看不见等级

replies.txt_content: 氵任务它不香嘛
